data.text: @BrainOfBPharm @idpharmd @IDstewardship @JGPharmD @julie_justo @MK_IDpharm @BradSpellberg @BRxAD Psst.  Sometimes I want to escape the husband too.

@mmPharmD @idpharmd @IDstewardship @JGPharmD @julie_justo @MK_IDpharm @BradSpellberg @BRxAD Why closet drinking? 

My wife and I openly drink around our daughter and she finds us wildly entertaining!

@idpharmd @mmPharmD @IDstewardship @JGPharmD @julie_justo @MK_IDpharm @BradSpellberg @BRxAD I have a co-worker who made a board game for ambulatory care pharmacy. I played it once and it was very cathartic! Friday afternoon hospital discharge - move back 4 spaces to reconcile med lists. Patient's A1c in goal - no medication adjustment needed! Skip ahead 3 spaces

@idpharmd @mmPharmD @IDstewardship @JGPharmD @julie_justo @MK_IDpharm @BradSpellberg @BRxAD Genius idea - difficult birth but mother & baby safe thanks to antibiotics. Later down stream - organ transplant not possible as patient colonised by resistant bacteria.

@idpharmd @IDstewardship @JGPharmD @julie_justo @MK_IDpharm @BradSpellberg @BRxAD This game is wildly inaccurate. 

There is no way parents resorted to closet drinking only at the very end....
